uid.description: Unique identifier of the VoiceCall object

duration.description: Duration of the call in seconds

created_at.description: The time the call was created

updated_at.description: The time the call was last updated

direction.description: Whether the call is inbound or outbound

staff_uid.description: Unique identifier of the staff member who answered the call

client_uid.description: Unique identifier of the client who made the call

from_number.description: The phone number the call was made from

to_number.description: The phone number the call was made to

external_app_url.description: Link to an application page with additional details about the call.

handled_by_staff_uid.description: The unique identifier of the staff who handled the call

handled_at.description: The date and time when the call was handled

deleted_at.description: Time the call was deleted - is null if the call is not deleted

example.call_summary: Client called to ask about their account balance

description: Represents a phone call record, including participants, status, recording and audit timestamps.
